scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');try{const rootSrc=path.resolve(process.cwd(),'..','dist','index.js');const rootDst=path.resolve(process.cwd(),'dist','index.js');if(fs.existsSync(rootSrc)){fs.copyFileSync(rootSrc,rootDst);console.log('copied root dist/index.js to examples/dist/index.js')}const htmlSrc=path.resolve(process.cwd(),'src','index.html');const htmlDst=path.resolve(process.cwd(),'dist','index.html');if(fs.existsSync(htmlSrc)){fs.copyFileSync(htmlSrc,htmlDst);console.log('copied src/index.html to dist/index.html')} }catch(e){console.error('copy failed:',e);process.exitCode=0;}"
